scripts.copy: rm -rf docs/index.appcache && cp ./src/index.appcache docs  && cp ./src/favicon.ico docs
scripts.build-dev: export NODE_ENV=development ; parcel build src/index.html -d docs  --no-minify --no-content-hash  --no-source-maps && rm -rf docs/index.appcache
scripts.docs-local: rm -rf docs && npm run docs-no-copy && gzip docs/*.* && npx http-server docs --gzip
scripts.docs: npm run docs-no-copy && npm run copy
scripts.docs-no-copy: npx tsc && export NODE_ENV=production && npm run pack-all && rm -rf docs && sh build-workers.sh && parcel build src/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --public-url './'
scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma all --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120 --no-bracket-spacing  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*"
scripts.test: npm run test-spec && npm run test-functional
scripts.test-functional: killall node && npx http-server docs/ & rm -rf tmp && mkdir -p tmp && npx tsc && npm run docs && npm run test-functional-run && killall node
scripts.pack-all: npm run pack-examples && npm run pack-files
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test-spec && npm run docs
